alert.note: Alert for Kauai East (Hawaii) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Surf Advisory issued November 16 at 3:41PM HST until November 17 at 6:00AM HST by NWS Honolulu
info.description: ...HIGH SURF ADVISORY FOR NORTH FACING SHORES OF NIIHAU KAUAI OAHU MOLOKAI AND MAUI... .The current northwest swell is transitioning to a more northerly direction (340 to 350 degrees) and will maintain advisory level surf along north facing shores of Niihau, Kauai, Oahu, Molokai, and Maui through tonight. ...HIGH SURF ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM HST THURSDAY... * WHAT...North facing shore surf 12 to 16 feet. * WHERE...Kauai East. * WHEN...Until 6 AM HST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Moderate. Strong breaking waves and strong currents will make swimming dangerous.
info.instruction: Head all advice from ocean safety officials. When in doubt, don`t go out.
